entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Creston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Creston 09:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain over southern sections overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with ice pellets in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
